body_html:
@klappradla is there anything else that could cause “my” tests to fail? I use rvm and had already set it to 2.3.3, rvm current also returns ruby-2.3.3, I've added a .ruby-version file just in case too, but it seems like something's still not quite right. 🤔
I still get 1287 examples, 10 failures, 3 pending every time I run all tests. This must be clearly some issue on my system then, because otherwise it makes no sense :(

body:
@klappradla is there anything else that could cause “my” tests to fail? I use rvm and had already set it to `2.3.3`,  `rvm current` also returns `ruby-2.3.3`, I've added a `.ruby-version` file just in case too, but it seems like something's still not quite right. 🤔 
I still get `1287 examples, 10 failures, 3 pending` every time I run all tests. This must be clearly some issue on my system then, because otherwise it makes no sense :(
